title: Empathy-Driven Language Learning Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Language Instruction Design Theory and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Solving real-world language learning problems for non-profit organizations through team-based projects in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can propose design solutions reflecting the emotional needs of target language learners through team-based collaboration
Learners can perform learner profiling by applying empathetic interviewing techniques in simulation/VR environments
Learners can develop and evaluate empathetic language learning prototypes executable within limited technological environments (smartphones)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
